title: Windows 8.1 Pro Update 1 x86 Plus Activator 8lite
description:
1 Burn to dvd or use usb tool
2 Install windows
3 Use activator provided "Microsoft toolkit" (windows icon > intall kms > EZ Activate DONE!!!)

My notes:
After windows had installed and all drivers 310MB of RAM was in use, Check Screenshot.
OS is extreamly stable big ups for that lite8.
So im sharing it with everyone now :)
